section.title: MarkAllUpdatedExcept Method - Atomia DNS API
section.para: Removes all change-rows for a zone and nameserver except the one with a specific id.

section.title: Declaration syntax
section.programlisting: void MarkAllUpdatedExcept( string zone, int changeid )

tr.td: zone to mark all updates as updated for
the id of the change-row to keep
